Key:
Ah. I was going to invite someone to go on the
hill for a date but... I was so worried about Kotori
I couldn't end up inviting anyone.

I guess today is kind of lost then. I can go
shopping then go home and wait for Kotori.
...I'm home.
Oh, you're finally home!
Shido? What are you doing there all by yourself?
Oh, nothing really.
Weird... is the bath already prepared?
Yeah, I got it ready.

Okay, then I'm going to go wash up.
I'm gonna be a while so don't worry about me.
W-Wait a minute!
...What? Don't tell me you want to go in with me.
O-Of course not!
Then what is it?

Oh... well... do you want to continue
our date from the afternoon?
What? Now? What time do you think it is?!

Well, our date was cut short wasn't it? I thought
maybe we could go on a walk. What do you say?
That's kind of like a date, isn't it?

Um... you're a Spirit. If I leave you be, there's
a chance you might go rogue, right?
W-Well, yeah, but...

If you end up feeling the kind of pain
you felt before, I...
Ah. If you're tired, we don't have to do it tonight.
Yeah, let's go.
No worries, we can just... wait, what?
Come on. Let's go.
Y-You sure?

You're the one who's inviting me.
Do you not want to go?
N-No, I'll go! Let's go!
Okay, hurry up and get ready.
O-Okay...

It's been a while since the two of us have
taken a walk like this.
Yeah...

Before you used to be so happy-go-lucky!
You would just call me Onii-chan and follow
me around everywhere!
You sure became a busy person.

I couldn't help it. We're the only ones who can
deal with the dangers of the Spirits.

Yeah... compared to back then,
you're totally like an adult now.
...Adult?

Yeah. Going on a date at night like this
makes me think about how time has passed.
Date? It's really just a night stroll.

Oh? Maybe we should hold hands
to make it feel more like a date.

W-What are you suggesting?
I'm not some child!
Oh. So you don't like that sort of thing?
No. I don't hate it.
Then here... lend me your hand.

What do you think? Does it feel more like
a date now?
How stupid.

Don't be like that. This is a date.
This isn't so bad, is it?
Yeah...
Hey, Kotori...
What is it?

I feel like I get where you're at, but...
don't push yourself too much, okay?
I know.
If there's anything I can do, let me know.
I'll do anything.
Kotori... are you listening?
I see. You said anything, right? Good.

What? Oh, maybe not... anything!
Forget I said that!

Too late. I heard it already. I'll be
counting on you Onii-chan.
Hahaha...
